item.title: Nipsey Russellâ€¦dead.
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: "Nipsey Russell, who played the Tin Man alongside Diana Ross and Michael Jackson in "The Wiz" as part of a decades-long career in stage, television and film, has died. He was 80." Read the whole article.
